column5: Wow,what a stroke of luck...... That boy better go out and buy himself a couple of loto tickets before its to late....
Amazing.....also amazing that it is all on film!
thats an amazing video,and a true trophy of a lifetime,all caught on tape....
what a fish!  I like how they refer to the guy as a "conservationist" in the video as he swims around with a spear gun...guess their definition is a little different than mine.
That was a huge fish... he was lucky not to get speared when the marlin flew through the baitfish.
